document_data.name: Drethna
document_data.mainbody: '''Drethna''' was a [[half-orc]] worshiper of [[Talos]] and a member of the [[anchorites of Talos]] active in southern [[Neverwinter Wood]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities:
Drethna was a [[Divine magic|divine]] spellcaster in service to the god [[Talos]].

In addition, she was a [[shapechanger]] who could freely take on the shape of a common wild [[boar]].
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century DR, the anchorites of Talos used their [[magic]] to send a number of [[ankheg]]s to attack a [[Tibor Wester's loggers' camp|logging camp]] in [[Neverwinter Wood]], and Drethna was placed in charge of observing whether anyone came to interfere. Rather than to fight, however, she preferred to simply keep watch in her boar shape, and to race off to the anchorite base at the [[Woodland Manse]] if she spotted anyone new or suspicious in the forest.
